00037 #ifndef Histogram_h
00038 #define Histogram_h
00039 
00040 #include "include/OpenCV.h"
00041 //#include "Image.h"
00042 #include "DrawableImage.h"

00044 namespace OpenCV {
00045     namespace Bitmap {
00046         typedef CvArr Signature;
00047         
00049         enum ComparisonMethod {
00050             Correlation =       CV_COMP_CORREL ,
00051             ChiSquare =         CV_COMP_CHISQR ,
00052             Intersection =      CV_COMP_INTERSECT ,
00053             BhattacharyyaDistance = CV_COMP_BHATTACHARYYA
00054         };
00055         
00057         enum HistogramType {
00058             Array =      CV_HIST_ARRAY ,
00059             Sparse = CV_HIST_SPARSE
00060         };
00061         
00063         enum DistanceType {
00064             ManhattanDistance = CV_DIST_L1,
00065             EuclideanDistance = CV_DIST_L2
00066         };
00067 
00074         class Histogram {
00075         public:
00076 // Constructors
00077             Histogram();
00078             Histogram(const Histogram&);
00087             Histogram(int, int*, float**, int = Array, Histogram* = NULL);
00088             virtual ~Histogram();
00089             
00090             /* Diferent histogram types constructors */
00098             static Histogram* createHSHistogram(const Image*, const Mask* = NULL, int = 30, int = 32);
00104             static Histogram* createRGBHistogram(const Image*, const Mask* = NULL);
00110             static Histogram* create1ChHistogram(const Image*, const Mask* = NULL);
00111             
00113             static Image* equalizeHist(const Image*);
00114             
00115 #ifdef DEBUG
00116             Mask* representInMask(); /* Debug purpouses only */
00117 #endif // DEBUG
00119             Histogram* copy() const;
00121             inline void clear() { cvClearHist(m_histogram); }
00122             
00123 // Getters and Setters
00124             inline double compare(const Histogram* hist, int method = Correlation) const { return cvCompareHist(m_histogram, hist->m_histogram, method); }
00125             float min() const;
00126             float max() const;
00127             float getValue(int, int = 0, int = 0) const;
00128             inline int dimensions() const { return m_histogram ? m_histogram->mat.dims : 0; }
00129             inline int dimensionSize(int dimension) const { return m_histogram && (dimension < dimensions()) ? m_histogram->mat.dim[dimension].size : 0; }
00130             
00131 // Public Methods
00138             static float calcEMD2(const Histogram*, const Histogram*, int = EuclideanDistance);
00139             
00145             inline float calcEMD2(const Histogram* histogram, int distanceType = EuclideanDistance) const { return calcEMD2(this, histogram, distanceType); }
00146             
00152             Mask* calcBackProjection(const Image*) const;
00154             Mask* calcPatchBackProjection(const Image*, CvSize, float, int) const;
00155             
00157             void normalize(double = 1.0l);
00159             inline void threshold(double threshold) { cvThreshHist(m_histogram, threshold); }
00160             
00161         protected:
00162 // Protected Methods
00163             inline Signature* signature() const { return createSignature(this); }
00164             static Signature* createSignature(const Histogram*);
00165             
00166             CvHistogram* m_histogram;
00167         };
00168     } // namespace Bitmap
00169 } // namespace OpenCV
